https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9RYxtMqNeNblhJSmFkKLplPJ6SU.jpg Aoluguya, Aoluguya is the first film in Gu Taoâ€™s Ewenki Trilogy. A tale that unfolds in the Aoluguya forest, featuring such unique characters as a mother who dulls her sadness over the absence of her son, Yuguo, with alcohol; her brother; and Maria, the tribal chieftain who watches over them.
